trans-unit.resname: DMU·66 | Soaring Drake | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The already spectacular views from the towers of the College at Lat-Nam are sometimes enhanced by glimpses of drakes diving into the ocean to devour small sharks.
trans-unit.target: 从大学院拉特南分院的高塔登高远望，其壮阔景象已然美不胜收；而有时还能看到龙兽俯冲洋面叼食幼鲨，更在秀丽画卷上增添生动点缀。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·67 | Sphinx of Clear Skies | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sphinx of Clear Skies
trans-unit.target: 朗空史芬斯

trans-unit.resname: DMU·67 | Sphinx of Clear Skies | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying, ward {2}
trans-unit.target: 飞行，守护{2}

trans-unit.resname: DMU·67 | Sphinx of Clear Skies | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Domain — Whenever Sphinx of Clear Skies deals combat damage to a player, reveal the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. An opponent separates those cards into two piles. Put one pile into your hand and the other into your graveyard. (Piles can be empty.)
trans-unit.target: 领土～每当朗空史芬斯对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，展示你牌库顶的X张牌，X为由你操控之地中基本地类别的数量。由任一对手将它们分成两堆。将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。（牌堆可以是空的。）

trans-unit.resname: DMU·68 | Talas Lookout | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Talas Lookout
trans-unit.target: 塔拉斯警戒员

trans-unit.resname: DMU·68 | Talas Lookout | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: DMU·68 | Talas Lookout | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: When Talas Lookout dies, look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other into your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 当塔拉斯警戒员死去时，检视你牌库顶的两张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，另一张则置入你的坟墓场。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·68 | Talas Lookout | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "The Talas pirates are motivated by money, so we paid them twice what they could steal from us to spy for us instead."\n—Jhoira
trans-unit.target: 「塔拉斯海盗全都见钱眼开，因此我把可能被他们拿走的损失加倍雇用他们来侦察。」 ～尤依拉

trans-unit.resname: DMU·69 | Tidepool Turtle | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tidepool Turtle
trans-unit.target: 潮湖龟

trans-unit.resname: DMU·69 | Tidepool Turtle | Card Text
trans-unit.source: {2}{U}: Scry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: {2}{U}：占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: DMU·69 | Tidepool Turtle | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Prized by wizards as a mobile scrying pool, it bears visions drawn from the depths of the sea.
trans-unit.target: 它是法师们眼中珍贵的移动占卜池，承载着取自深洋的视象。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·70 | Timely Interference | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Timely Interference
trans-unit.target: 及时干预

trans-unit.resname: DMU·70 | Timely Interference | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{R} (You may pay an additional {1}{R} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{1}{R}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}{R}。）

trans-unit.resname: DMU·70 | Timely Interference | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Target creature gets -1/-0 until end of turn. If this spell was kicked, that creature blocks this turn if able.
trans-unit.target: 目标生物得-1/-0直到回合结束。如果此咒语已增幅，则该生物本回合若能进行阻挡，则必须阻挡。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·70 | Timely Interference | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·70 | Timely Interference | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Students fled with their research as Tolaria fell to the Phyrexians.
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚落入非瑞克西亚之手后，学生们纷纷带着自己的研究逃跑。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·71 | Tolarian Geyser | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tolarian Geyser
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚式潮涌

trans-unit.resname: DMU·71 | Tolarian Geyser | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Kicker {W} (You may pay an additional {W} as you cast this spell.)
trans-unit.target: 增幅{W}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{W}。）

trans-unit.resname: DMU·71 | Tolarian Geyser | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Return target creature to its owner's hand. Draw a card. If this spell was kicked, you gain 3 life.
trans-unit.target: 将目标生物移回其拥有者手上。抓一张牌。如果此咒语已增幅，则你获得3点生命。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·71 | Tolarian Geyser | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "If they don't drown, perhaps they'll rust."
trans-unit.target: 「如果他们淹不死，大概也会生锈。」

trans-unit.resname: DMU·72 | Tolarian Terror | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tolarian Terror
trans-unit.target: 陶拉里亚惧兽

trans-unit.resname: DMU·72 | Tolarian Terror | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: This spell costs {1} less to cast for each instant and sorcery card in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 你坟墓场中每有一张瞬间与法术牌，此咒语便减少{1}来施放。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·72 | Tolarian Terror | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Ward {2} (Whenever this creature becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter it unless that player pays {2}.)
trans-unit.target: 守护{2}（每当此生物成为由对手操控之咒语或异能的目标时，除非该牌手支付{2}，否则反击之。）

trans-unit.resname: DMU·72 | Tolarian Terror | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Afterward, a number of treatises on sea serpent morphology were swiftly revised.
trans-unit.target: 在这之后，人们迅速修订许多关于海洋巨蛇形态学方面的论述。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·73 | Vesuvan Duplimancy | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Vesuvan Duplimancy
trans-unit.target: 维苏瓦复制术

trans-unit.resname: DMU·73 | Vesuvan Duplimancy | Card Text
trans-unit.source: Whenever you cast a spell that targets only a single artifact or creature you control, create a token that's a copy of that artifact or creature, except it's not legendary.
trans-unit.target: 每当你施放仅以单一由你操控的神器或生物为目标的咒语时，派出一个衍生物，此衍生物为该神器或生物的复制品，但它不是传奇。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·73 | Vesuvan Duplimancy | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There hasn't been an original thought on Vesuva in centuries."\n—Emmest, Tolarian chronicler
trans-unit.target: 「维苏瓦几百年来未再出现过任何原创思想。」 ～陶拉里亚年代史家埃默斯特

trans-unit.source: Domain — When Voda Sea Scavenger enters the battlefield, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. You may put one of those cards on top of your library. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.
trans-unit.target: 领土～当伏特海拾荒客进战场时，检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为由你操控之地中基本地类别的数量。你可以将其中一张置于你的牌库顶。将其余的牌以随机顺序置于你牌库底。

trans-unit.source: Ships suspected of carrying Sheoldred's agents have a tendency to drift far off course as they sail through the Voda Sea.
trans-unit.target: 怀疑搭载希欧蕊密探的船只在航经伏特海时，往往会大幅度偏离航道。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·80 | Battle-Rage Blessing | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Since when is it cheating to give one side an unfair advantage?"\n—Braids
trans-unit.target: 「让一方获得不公平的优势怎么能算是作弊呢？」 ～布蕾德

trans-unit.resname: DMU·81 | Battlefly Swarm | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Having encountered the bitter Phyrexian battleflies before, Squee knew not to bother eating them—or at least to stop after the fifth.
trans-unit.target: 斯奎尝过非瑞克西亚战蝇的苦味道，知道犯不着再去吃它们～或最多吃五只就停下。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·82 | Blight Pile | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Keep your distance. It may be broken, but it's far from benign."\n—Stenn
trans-unit.target: 「保持距离。它或许坏了，但远没到无害的程度。」 ～斯特恩

trans-unit.target: 「钢铁或许更耐用，但还是骨头最适合传递冤死者的愤恨。」 ～布蕾德

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker. If you do, each opponent may sacrifice a permanent that shares a card type with it. For each opponent who doesn't, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以牺牲一个神器，生物，结界，地或鹏洛客。若你如此作，则每位对手各可以牺牲一个与之具共通牌张类别的永久物。对每位未如此作的对手而言，该牌手失去2点生命且你抓一张牌。

Put up to one of them on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order. Then if there are five basic land types among lands you control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 领土～每当佐雅飞兽乘员妮尔对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为由你操控之地中基本地类别的数量。将其中至多一张置于你的牌库顶，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。然后若由你操控的地中有五种基本地类别，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·229 | Automatic Librarian | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Automatic Librarian
trans-unit.target: 自动图书馆员

trans-unit.resname: DMU·229 | Automatic Librarian | Card Text
trans-unit.source: When Automatic Librarian enters the battlefield, scry 2. (Look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom of your library and the rest on top in any order.)
trans-unit.target: 当自动图书馆员进战场时，占卜2。（检视你牌库顶的两张牌，然后将其中任意数量的牌以任意顺序置于你牌库底，其余则以任意顺序置于你牌库顶。）

trans-unit.resname: DMU·229 | Automatic Librarian | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Enforcing absolute quiet with extreme prejudice since 3285 AR.
trans-unit.target: 利用极端偏见确保绝对安静，从阿基夫纪元3285年起始终如一。

trans-unit.target: 黄金阿格西号

trans-unit.resname: DMU·230 | Golden Argosy | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Whenever Golden Argosy attacks, exile each creature that crewed it this turn. Return them to the battlefield tapped under their owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 每当黄金阿格西号攻击时，放逐所有本回合中搭载过它的生物。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它们在其拥有者的操控下横置移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·230 | Golden Argosy | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Crew 1 (Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 1 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)
trans-unit.target: 搭载1（横置任意数量由你操控且力量总和等于或大于1的生物：此载具成为神器生物直到回合结束。）

trans-unit.target: 佩带{2}

trans-unit.resname: DMU·231 | Hero's Heirloom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "A blade is just a tool. Its power comes from the hand that wields it."\n—Danitha

trans-unit.source: {1}, {T}, Sacrifice Inscribed Tablet: Reveal the top five cards of your library. Put a land card from among them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order. If you didn't put a card into your hand this way, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: {1}，{T}，牺牲雕印石板：展示你牌库顶的五张牌。将其中一张地牌置于你手上，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。如果你未以此法将牌置于手上，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·254 | Sacred Peaks | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Everyone is welcome in the floating Serran cities, though few but the most faithful attempt the ascent.
trans-unit.target: 漂浮空中的撒拉都市欢迎所有人到访，但仅有寥寥无几的虔诚信徒才会尝试跻身其间。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·255 | Shivan Reef | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The boiling seas around Shiv provided a welcome layer of protection for the reclaimed Mana Rig.
trans-unit.target: 西瓦周边的沸腾洋面，为重新夺回的魔力钻探机提供了一道不可多得的防御天堑。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·256 | Sulfurous Springs | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Everything is flammable in the Burning Isles, even the mana itself.
trans-unit.target: 燃烧群岛万物皆可燃，包括法术力本身。

trans-unit.target: 阳辉沼地

trans-unit.resname: DMU·257 | Sunlit Marsh | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Even the poisoned land around the Stronghold blossomed with new life in the wake of the Great Mending.
trans-unit.target: 世界愈合后，就连天罗城塞周边的剧毒土壤也绽放出新的生命。

trans-unit.target: 繁根孤岛

trans-unit.resname: DMU·258 | Tangled Islet | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Many of Terisiare's islands are merely extensions of the root system of the Yavimaya magnigoth forests.
trans-unit.target: 许多泰瑞西亚岛屿不过是亚维马雅马尼古斯树林根系的延伸。

trans-unit.source: Thran Portal
trans-unit.target: 索蓝境界通道

trans-unit.resname: DMU·259 | Thran Portal | Card Text: Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Thran Portal enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or fewer other lands.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控两个或更少其他地，否则索蓝境界通道须横置进战场。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·259 | Thran Portal | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: As Thran Portal enters the battlefield, choose a basic land type.
trans-unit.target: 于索蓝境界通道进战场时，选择一种基本地类别。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·259 | Thran Portal | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: Thran Portal is the chosen type in addition to its other types.
trans-unit.target: 索蓝境界通道额外具有该类别。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·259 | Thran Portal | Card Text: Paragraph 4
trans-unit.source: Mana abilities of Thran Portal cost an additional 1 life to activate.
trans-unit.target: 索蓝境界通道的法术力异能须额外支付1点生命来起动。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·260 | Wooded Ridgeline | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The power of long-forgotten empires still pulses in the earth of Dominaria, giving rise to strange, mana-rich pockets of growth.
trans-unit.target: 遭忘已久的王朝力量仍在多明纳里亚地表脉动，令各地纷纷出现许多富含法术力的奇异植生区域。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·261 | Yavimaya Coast | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: As magnigoth trees expanded across the sea into Almaaz and New Argive, it became clear Yavimaya's borders were never confined by its coastline.
trans-unit.target: 随着马尼古斯树穿越大海扎根阿玛兹和新阿基夫，大家方才醒悟亚维马雅的边界绝不会受海岸束缚。

trans-unit.source: "Heroism is neither a strong arm nor a divine destiny. It is the choice to stand unbowed against impossible odds."
trans-unit.target: 「勇行既非强大武力，也非神圣命途。而是面对难挽颓势依旧屹立不屈。」

trans-unit.resname: DMU·283 | Cosmic Epiphany | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "All knowledge, past and future, is etched upon reality. Every answer we seek is out there, hidden only by the limits of our minds."\n—Jodah
trans-unit.target: 「无论既往或未来，所有知识均已蚀刻于现实中。我们追寻的答案俱已存在，与吾人之间唯一阻隔便是心灵的界限。」 ～裘达

trans-unit.resname: DMU·286 | Briar Hydra | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Flora and fauna alike rose to Yavimaya's defense.

trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker. If you do, each opponent may sacrifice a permanent that shares a card type with it. For each opponent who doesn't, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以牺牲一个神器，生物，结界，地或鹏洛客。若你如此作，则每位对手各可以牺牲一个与之具共通牌张类别的永久物。对每位未如此作的对手而言，该牌手失去2点生命且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.target: 在每个结束步骤开始时，若本回合中有牌手弃过牌，则派出一个1/1黑色，具飞行与「此生物不能进行阻挡」的鸟衍生生物。

trans-unit.target: {3}{B}，{T}：每位对手各弃一张牌。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.source: Flying
trans-unit.target: 飞行

trans-unit.resname: DMU·347 | Nael, Avizoa Aeronaut | Card Text: Paragraph 2
trans-unit.source: Domain — Whenever Nael, Avizoa Aeronaut deals combat damage to a player, look at the top X cards of your library, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control. Put up to one of them on top of your library and the rest on the bottom in a random order. Then if there are five basic land types among lands you control, draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 领土～每当佐雅飞兽乘员妮尔对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，检视你牌库顶的X张牌，X为由你操控之地中基本地类别的数量。将其中至多一张置于你的牌库顶，其余则以随机顺序置于你的牌库底。然后若由你操控的地中有五种基本地类别，则抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·371 | Ajani, Sleeper Agent | Card Text: Paragraph 2

trans-unit.resname: DMU·371 | Ajani, Sleeper Agent | Card Text: Paragraph 3
trans-unit.source: −3: Distribute three +1/+1 counters among up to three target creatures. They gain vigilance until end of turn.

trans-unit.resname: DMU·371 | Ajani, Sleeper Agent | Card Text: Paragraph 4

trans-unit.resname: DMU·433 | Lightning Strike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Danitha watched in shock as electricity lanced from Jaya's fingertips, obliterating the charging Phyrexians. "What?" said the pyromancer serenely. "I told you I'd learned some new tricks."
trans-unit.target: 眼见雅亚指尖窜出闪电将来袭非瑞克西亚人劈散，达妮莎看得目瞪口呆。「怎么？」烈焰术士平淡地说。「告诉过你我学了新招数。」
